Text: RE ECommerce Forum Cc I agree particularly with respect to countries other than the US where the law is much murkier Bob will be working on this issue Rick Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday June PM To Cc Subject Re ECommerce Forum From SMTPMARKE NRONCOM Sent Thursday June PM To Cc Subject Re ECommerce Forum Auto forwarded by a Rule Rick As you know Clinton should sign over the next couple of days legislation on electronic signatures There is a big need to standardize the approach with respect to esignatures on trading contracts and maybe confirmations I think this is an area that ISDA could provide leadership and possibly make money through a protocol Let me know what you think Mark
